{{ddcl|header=chrono|since=c++20|
template&lt; class Duration &gt;
class hh_mm_ss;
}}

The class template {{tt|hh_mm_ss}} splits a {{lc|std::chrono::duration}} into a "broken down" time such as ''hours'':''minutes'':''seconds'', with the precision of the split determined by the {{tt|Duration}} template parameter. It is primarily a formatting tool.

{{tt|Duration}} must be a specialization of {{lc|std::chrono::duration}}, otherwise the program is ill-formed.
